title: (your) roster for all roles
body:
Who here has a good all-rounded roster for all roles and types? What are they?

I mean AD, AP (damage or control, or both, whatever) and Tank for each role, as it were (excluding adc, of course).

replies.body:
top:          yorick
                 sion
mid:         anivia
                viktor
jg:            vi
                sion
adc:         tristanna
                 caitlyn (soon)
support: sion
                nami

aye we got a jungle sion drifter! I don't play jungle sion much, but my god is it hilarious when you do like right angle turns and come out of the jungle roaring to get a huge knockup on the enemy. The drifting game is real.

i hate when the game unecesarily turns my when im trying to ult, and that right angle mustve been cool, also, try this more often cuz i discovered something that i would like to see turn strategy. when u see a sion ulting towards u, place a {{item:3512}} , it counts as a wall for sion ult

Top:
Maokai, Lee, Irelia

Mid:
Brand, Syndra, Oriana, Lucian

Jg:
Nocturne, Lee, Diana

Adc:
Varus

Supp:
All except alistar/taric

Occasionally i flex a few off meta-supports in:
Yasuo, Leblanc, Brand, Malzahar, Miss Forutne, Kalista
